title: Saint Andrew, Plate 2 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul
marks:
Signature and Inscription

LLC of the sheet, pri LLC of the image, in the print: [HG]
description: balding old man with curly hair and long wavy beard, looking over his PL shoulder, with his PR hand on the side of his head and his PL hand resting on a book; mountain landscape in background; X-shaped cross over man\'s PR shoulder; text at bottom:  \"II. / ET IN IESUM CHRISTUM / FILIUM EIUS UNICUM, DOMIN- / UM NOSTRUM]
creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
